user_question: What certifications are required to become a certified dragon trainer in the fictional land of Draconia?
final_answer: In the fictional land of Draconia, to become a certified dragon trainer, one must obtain the following certifications: 1) Basic Dragon Handling Certificate, 2) Advanced Fire Safety and Control Certification, 3) Dragon Communication and Psychology Diploma, 4) Flight Safety and Navigation License, and 5) Magical Creature First Aid Certification.
